original_title: Trilogy of Terror: Theater of the Mind Radio Drama
overview: Performed in the style of an old time radio drama, Trilogy of Terror features original plays based on three classic horror tales. "The Fall of the House of Usher" by Edgar Allan Poe, "The Cats of Ulthar" by H.P. Lovecraft and "The Legend of Sleepy Hollow" by Washington Irving. Performed in front of a live, studio audience with actors playing multiple roles and live sound effects.
title: Trilogy of Terror: Theater of the Mind Radio Drama
